::Hot Rod::

He walks over and stands over Halucigen. He points one arm at
Halucigen's head. The three laser blasters on that arm locked on.
"Sorry. I'm Hot Rod, heroic Autobot and Maximal defender, blah blah
blah. And you are dead!"
He fires the three laser shots at Halucigen's head, from point blank
range.
